summary: Completed testing of bobber visibility and button font size changes. Found critical issue with bobber still visible during waiting state in 80% of casts.

critical_bugs.issue: Red/white bobber target is visible during waiting state in 4 out of 5 casts, should be completely hidden
critical_bugs.expected_behavior: Bobber should only be visible during bite state, completely hidden during waiting
critical_bugs.actual_behavior: Bobber appears during waiting state inconsistently (80% failure rate)

ui_bugs.issue: Inconsistent bobber visibility - sometimes hidden correctly (cast #2), sometimes visible incorrectly (casts #1,3,4,5)
ui_bugs.details: Code shows condition {store.fishingState === 'bite' && (...)} but bobber still appears during waiting

passed_tests: Cast button font size reduced to 8.8px
Reel button font size reduced to 8px
Bobber visibility during bite state (correctly visible)
Button text fits inside buttons properly
action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: Fix bobber visibility logic - the red/white target bobber is still appearing during waiting state in 80% of casts. The condition {store.fishingState === 'bite' && (...)} should completely hide the bobber during waiting, but it's not working consistently. Need to investigate fishing state management and ensure bobber is only rendered during bite state.
